greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into 7 squares.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_] := b[n, i, t] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i<1 || t<1, 0, b[n, i-1, t] + If[i^2 > n, 0, b[n-i^2, i, t-1]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, Sqrt[n] // Floor, 7]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 120}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 11 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
